message:

Separation of Capture and Edit parts.

new activity to Edit like another third party app.

title: [ALL] Activity lifecycle issue solved
message:
[ALL] Activity lifecycle issue solved

Thanks:
* taskAffinity to separate capture and view/gallery
* singleTask to destroy View on background if starting gallery or
another view

Bug if let it in activity stack:
open gallery
view an image
tap home button
open edit mode from launcher icon

Result: restore view activity
Expected result: open capture activity

Signed-off-by: Sebastien MICHEL <michoux@gmail.com>

title: Prevent open PhotoCaptionView on a previous photo
message:
Prevent open PhotoCaptionView on a previous photo

If you open a photo with photocaption view and bring it to background
(home key). If you ask to open another photo photoCaption View resumed
with the previous image. To prevent this we finish the activity on it go
onPause.
